SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

-- Examine the data types for the columns
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'

-- Find maximum records length
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationID)) LocationID,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) Borough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) Zone,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone)) service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- use WITH clause to provide explicit data types

SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    ) AS [result]


SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases;

-- Set collation on database level

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]


-- SELECT only subset of columns with header

SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]


-- SELECT only subset of columns without header

SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) 
    WITH(
        -- add order postion 
        Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) 3
    ) AS [result]

-- Edit column names

SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW=2
    ) 
    WITH(
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS [result]

-- Create External table
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/',

);

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data;

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedl1968.dfs.core.windows.net/raw',
);

SELECT name, location FROM sys.external_data_sources;

-- SELECT FROM EXTERNAL TABLE 
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW=2
    ) 
    WITH(
        location_id SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) AS [result]

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )AS cal;


-- Describing data types
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''calendar.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )AS cal'

-- Defining data types
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )
    WITH(
        date_key INT,
        date DATE,
        year SMALLINT,
        month TINYINT,
        day TINYINT,
        day_name VARCHAR(10),
        day_of_year SMALLINT,
        week_of_month TINYINT,
        week_of_year TINYINT,
        month_name VARCHAR(10),
        year_month INT,
        year_week INT
    )AS cal;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vendor_unquoted.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )AS vendor;

-- Escaped row
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vendor_escaped.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        ESCAPECHAR='\\'
    )AS vendor;

-- Quoted row
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vendor.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )AS vendor;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t'
    )AS trip_type;

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

-- JSON_VALUE Function\
SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc') AS  VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS payment_type;


-- OPENJSON Function\
SELECT payment_type,description
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        description VARCHAR(15) '$.payment_type_desc'
    );

---------------------------------
-- Reading data from JSON with arrays
---------------------------------
SELECT 
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS  VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc_0,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc[1].value') AS  VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc_1
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS payment_type;

-- Use OPENJSON to explode the array
SELECT payment_type,sub_type,value
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
    )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
    WITH(
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        value VARCHAR(15)
    );

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

-- Query Standard JSON
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20) 
    );

-- Query Multi Line JSON (Which is there's no difference)
SELECT rate_code_id,rate_code
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code_multi_line.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
    AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20) 
    );
